entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
